ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: I mostly agree with Inferno on the teleporting. I don t think teleporting long distances is legal, but short distances (as Logo said, 50 feet or so), is fine.

I mostly agree with Inferno on the teleporting. I don't think teleporting 
long distances is legal, but short distances (as Logo said, 50 feet or so), 
is fine. Just remember that teleporting ussually takes alot of energy (most 
of the toys and fan-created characters I've seen that can teleport go into 
stasis lock after the procedure), so don't overdo it.

::Prowl::

Prowl nearly loses his balance as Iron Raptor throws her arms around him. His 
arm goes around her waist, Prowl not minding that she was holding him rather 
hard. He smiles as she replies, sliding his other arm around her. He presses 
Iron Raptor to himself, relieved to once again hold her in his arms.

Prowl leans his head forward, locking his lips with Iron Raptor's. A relieved 
shudder runs through him as he feels her lips on his, and her body being 
pressed to him. He raises his head, looking down at Iron Raptor.

Prowl grins. "I take my eyes off you for a minute, and you go and get 
yourself kidnapped!" he says jokingly, looking into her optics, love for her 
mixed with relief at the fact that he had rescued her in his.
